scripts.setup:board: snarkjs groth16 setup circom/build/board.r1cs powersOfTau28_hez_final_14.ptau circom/build/board_0000.zkey
scripts.setup:impact: snarkjs groth16 setup circom/build/impact.r1cs powersOfTau28_hez_final_14.ptau circom/build/impact_0000.zkey
scripts.contribute:board: snarkjs zkey contribute circom/build/board_0000.zkey circom/build/board_final.zkey --name="Battleship Board Circuit"
scripts.contribute:impact: snarkjs zkey contribute circom/build/impact_0000.zkey circom/build/impact_final.zkey --name="Battleship Shot Circuit"
scripts.export:board: snarkjs zkey export solidityverifier circom/build/board_final.zkey contracts/src/BoardVerifier.sol && snarkjs zkey export verificationkey circom/build/board_final.zkey circom/build/board_vkey.json
scripts.export:impact: snarkjs zkey export solidityverifier circom/build/impact_final.zkey contracts/src/ImpactVerifier.sol && snarkjs zkey export verificationkey circom/build/impact_final.zkey circom/build/impact_vkey.json
scripts.build: pnpm run compile:board && pnpm run compile:impact
scripts.setup: pnpm run setup:board && pnpm run setup:impact
scripts.contribute: pnpm run contribute:board && pnpm run contribute:impact
scripts.export: pnpm run export:board && pnpm run export:impact
